message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to your business.  I'm confident that it can generate substantial returns. While I'm not at liberty to disclose the exact details just yet, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
